Waveform Measurements: Core measurement capabilities
demonstrates: oscura.frequency() - Measure frequency from period detection
oscura.rise_time() - Measure rising edge transition time
oscura.fall_time() - Measure falling edge transition time
oscura.duty_cycle() - Measure duty cycle of periodic signals

docstring: Statistical Analysis: Distribution and outlier detection
demonstrates: oscura.basic_stats() - Calculate mean, median, std, min, max, range

docstring: Spectral Analysis: Core frequency domain measurements
Filtering: Comprehensive signal filtering capabilities
demonstrates: Filter types: Butterworth, Chebyshev I, Chebyshev II, Bessel, Elliptic

docstring: Triggering: Event detection and signal synchronization
demonstrates: oscura.EdgeTrigger - Rising and falling edge detection

docstring: Math Operations: Arithmetic and signal processing
demonstrates: Peak detection and envelope extraction concepts

docstring: Wavelet Analysis: Time-frequency analysis for transient signals
demonstrates: Morlet, Mexican hat (Ricker) wavelets for CWT
Time-frequency localization comparison: Wavelet vs FFT
Transient detection in signals with step changes and impulses

docstring: Serial Protocol Decoding: Comprehensive demonstration of UART, SPI, I2C, and 1-Wire
demonstrates: oscura.decode_uart() - UART/serial communication with baud rate detection
oscura.decode_spi() - SPI protocol with configurable clock/data modes
oscura.decode_i2c() - I2C protocol with start/stop conditions

docstring: Automotive Protocol Decoding: Comprehensive demonstration of CAN, CAN-FD, LIN, and FlexRay
demonstrates: oscura.decode_can() - CAN bus decoding with standard and extended frames
oscura.decode_can_fd() - CAN-FD decoding with dual bitrates
oscura.decode_lin() - LIN bus decoding for low-speed automotive
oscura.decode_flexray() - FlexRay decoding for deterministic communication

docstring: Debug Protocol Decoding: JTAG, SWD, and USB protocol demonstration
demonstrates: oscura.decode_jtag() - JTAG/Boundary-Scan with TAP state machine tracking
oscura.decode_swd() - ARM Serial Wire Debug with DP/AP access
oscura.decode_usb() - USB Low/Full Speed with NRZI encoding

docstring: Parallel Bus Protocol Decoding: IEEE-488, Centronics, and ISA demonstration
demonstrates: oscura.decode_isa() - ISA bus address/data transaction decoding

demonstrates: oscura.decode_i2s() - I2S audio bus with stereo sample extraction
oscura.decode_hdlc() - HDLC telecom framing with bit stuffing

docstring: Protocol Auto-Detection: Unified protocol detection and decoding demonstration
demonstrates: oscura.auto_decode() - Automatic protocol detection and decoding

Automatic baud rate recovery and format detection
